main event: A UFOB sighting was reported in Holt, Florida on June 27, 1955. Three observers reported seeing a disc-shaped object with blue-white color and red blinking lights just above the trees during a stormy weather with lightning and haze.
interesting points: The sighting involved a disc-shaped object with blue-white color and red blinking lights, making it a detailed and specific observation.
The report mentions the difficulty in identifying the object due to the stormy weather and lightning, adding to the mysterious nature of the sighting.
The observers reported the object being just above the trees, indicating a low altitude which adds to the unusual nature of the sighting.

The report also highlights the unreliable nature of the observers and the delay in investigating the original report, raising questions about the credibility and thoroughness of the investigation process.
The report mentions the possibility of obtaining additional data for analysis of the incident, demonstrating an ongoing effort to understand and analyze the sighting.
sighted object: One disc-shaped, blue-white object with red blinking lights
